participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

ksads_dmdd_raw_963_t.Description: How many times per week do you yell when you are upset? | 0=Zero; 1=One; 2=Two; 3=Three; 4=Four or more

ksads_dmdd_raw_972_t.Description: When would you say the problems with your temper began?

ksads_dmdd_raw_971_t.Description: Was there a time in the past year when you did not lose your temper at all for 3 months or longer? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dmdd_raw_970_t.Description: In the past year, in which situations have you lost your temper:Others Places | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dmdd_raw_969_t.Description: In the past year, in which situations have you lost your temper:With Family | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dmdd_raw_968_t.Description: In the past year, in which situations have you lost your temper:With Friends | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dmdd_raw_967_t.Description: In the past year, in which situations have you lost your temper:At School | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dmdd_raw_965_t.Description: How many times per week do you kick or punch people or things when you are upset? | 0=Zero; 1=One; 2=Two; 3=Three; 4=Four or more

ksads_dmdd_raw_964_t.Description: How many times per week do you throw things when you are upset? | 0=Zero; 1=One; 2=Two; 3=Three; 4=Four or more

ksads_dmdd_raw_962_t.Description: How many temper outbursts do you typically have per week? | 0=Zero; 1=One; 2=Two; 3=Three; 4=Four or more

ksads_dmdd_raw_961_t.Description: Have you had trouble with your temper since you were young, since before you were 10? | 0=No; 1=Yes
